googledriveinstitutions_file_added: ${user} added file ${googledriveinstitutions_path} to Google Drive in ${node}
googledriveinstitutions_file_updated: ${user} updated file ${googledriveinstitutions_path} in Google Drive in ${node}
googledriveinstitutions_folder_created: ${user} created folder ${googledriveinstitutions_path} in Google Drive in ${node}
googledriveinstitutions_node_authorized: ${user} authorized the Google Drive addon for ${node}
googledriveinstitutions_node_deauthorize: ${user} deauthorized the Google Drive addon for ${node}
